items.title: Un dipinto di Caravaggio esposto al museo Capodimonte,Napoli
items.summary: A painting by Caravaggio is on display at the Capodimonte Museum in Naples, with visitors viewing two of his works. One of the paintings, 'Ecce Homo', was rediscovered in Madrid in 2021 after being created in Naples four centuries ago.

items.title: Digital literacy vs. digital fluency: Learn the differences
items.summary: Business and IT leaders are emphasizing the importance of workers developing digital capabilities, distinguishing between digital literacy and digital fluency to address this need.

items.title: PayPal Now Available Directly in Wix Payments Platform in US
items.summary: PayPal is now directly available in the Wix Payments platform in the US, offering a deeper integration for users. The service is currently available to Wix Payments users in the United States with plans for further expansion.

items.title: ‘The market didn’t need more of the same’: Media.net’s CRO on how SSPs are evolving
items.summary: Media.net's CRO discusses the evolving landscape of SSPs and the strategic decision to launch its own SSP five years ago amidst a crowded market.

items.title: LECTRA: First half 2025: stable revenues and limited decline in EBITDA in a context of increased volatility in Q2
items.summary: LECTRA reports stable revenues and limited decline in EBITDA for the first half of 2025, amidst increased volatility in Q2.

items.title: Zircuit Launches AI Trading Engine for Lightning-Fast, Cross-Chain Trading
items.summary: Zircuit launches AI trading engine for lightning-fast, cross-chain trading, building on the success of Deposit Vaults.

items.title: cellmap-data 2025.7.24.1615
items.summary: Utility for loading CellMap data for machine learning training, utilizing PyTorch, Xarray, TensorStore, and PyDantic.

items.title: How Samsung's Galaxy AI Boosts Gaming Performance
items.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 and S25 Ultra use AI to boost gaming performance, providing users with console-level gaming on their smartphones.

items.summary: LegalOn closes $50M Series E funding round and partners with OpenAI to develop advanced AI agents for their agentic AI product.

items.title: OpenAI said to release GPT-5 in August
items.summary: OpenAI is set to release its most advanced AI assistant model, GPT-5, in August according to sources, marking a significant innovation in the field of AI.

items.title: Treatments From Llama Brains Can Help People With Schizophrenia
items.summary: Antibodies from llamas could be used to create a new generation of schizophrenia treatments that can effectively target the brain, rather than just reducing symptoms.

items.title: 3 Ways Automation Can Power Up Your Marketing
items.summary: Real estate professionals can benefit from automation in marketing, which can save time and yield better results. By using AI-powered tools, listings can gain momentum and reach more potential buyers.

items.title: India-UK FTA unlocks financial services boom
items.summary: India-UK FTA unlocks financial services boom with 'unbound' and 'none' limitations on market access for Indian firms.

items.title: Tesla drops 9% after earnings miss — Elon Musk loses $12 billion amid historic revenue decline
items.summary: Tesla's stock drops 9% after earnings miss, causing Elon Musk to lose $12 billion in value. The company reported a significant revenue decline in Q2 2025, with a 12% drop in revenue and weaker-than-expected profits.

items.title: dhrupad-sah-exception-catcher 1.0.4
items.summary: dhrupad-sah-exception-catcher 1.0.4 tool has been developed to automatically catch and report exceptions to Mira Sentinel with rich context and log integration for AI-powered debugging and automatic fix generation.

items.title: ISACA Expands Eligibility of First-ever Advanced AI Audit Certification
items.summary: ISACA has expanded the eligibility of their first-ever Advanced AI Audit Certification, including six additional global credentials among prerequisites. This allows a greater number of audit certification holders to pursue the new Advanced in AI Audit (AAIA) credential.

items.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
items.summary: White House unveils plan to "win" global AI race through deregulation, sparking pushback.

items.title: Hulk Hogan Dead At 71: Wrestler Died After 'Cardiac Arrest' Call - Updates
items.summary: WWE legend Hulk Hogan has reportedly passed away at age 71, with the news being generated by an AI voice. The use of AI in creating news articles raises concerns about accuracy and potential inconsistencies.

items.title: Sam Altman reveals his fears for humanity as ‘this weird emergent thing’ of AI keeps evolving: ‘No one knows what happens next’
items.summary: Sam Altman expresses his concerns about the evolving nature of AI and its impact on humanity, emphasizing the urgent need for ethical alignment and a united cultural response.

items.title: vector-vault 7.1.2
items.summary: Vector Vault 7.1.2 allows for the rapid creation of RAG apps and agents to utilize the full potential of AI.

items.title: MSI GeForce RTX 50 Series: Your Gateway to Next-Generation Gaming, Creativity, and Professional Excellence
items.summary: MSI introduces the GeForce RTX 50 Series graphics cards which promise to provide next-generation gaming, creativity, and professional excellence through AI-related technology.

items.title: Red Hat and Simudyne: Empowering stock exchanges with AI-driven market simulation
items.summary: Red Hat and Simudyne are collaborating to empower stock exchanges with AI-driven market simulation, catering to the demanding financial sector's need for efficient and uninterrupted workload support for analyzing market trends, executing trading decisions, and gaining a competitive advantage.

items.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT is 'bad' and 'dangerous' if used like this: OpenAI CEO warns AI users

items.title: How this Canadian developer is following up one of the most popular multiplayer games ever
items.summary: Canadian developer Digital Extremes is following up its popular multiplayer game with a new original gaming property called Soulframe.

items.summary: Lyft is allowing users to 'favorite' or block drivers as part of a loyalty push to encourage users to stay on the platform.

items.summary: Agentic AI systems are expected to significantly enhance business performance by working collaboratively, according to industry experts.

items.summary: The Figma IPO is anticipated to arrive, but questions remain about whether it can justify its valuation in a hot market for IPOs. items.summary: Chinese authorities warn comedians about jokes that could fuel resentment between men and women, as voice used in the act is AI-generated, leading to possible inconsistencies.

items.title: South Park Roasted Trump and Paramount Right After Signing a $1B+ Deal With the Network
items.summary: South Park's season 27 premiere mocks the cancelling of 'The Late Show' and CBS's settlement, right after Paramount signs a $1B+ deal with the network, raising concerns about ethics in the media industry.

items.title: iPhone Users Are More Likely To Fall For Scams Than Android Users
items.summary: iPhone users are more susceptible to online scams and less likely to practice safe online habits compared to Android users, according to research from cybersecurity firm Malwarebytes.

items.title: Mom and Dad of 4 Used To Do Weekends Together—Then Realized Their Mistake
items.summary: Two parents from Oklahoma City are going viral for using AI-generated voice technology to create much-needed time alone.

items.title: Analysts unveil bold Amazon stock price target before earnings
items.summary: Analysts predict Amazon stock price to rise due to the company's focus on generative artificial intelligence. Amazon acquires Bee AI, a startup specializing in AI-powered wearable devices, indicating a move into personal AI hardware.

items.title: Alphabet CEO Weighs In: Smart Glasses Won’t Replace Phones Anytime Soon
items.summary: During the Alphabet Q2 2025 earnings call, CEO Sundar Pichai believes that smart glasses won’t replace phones anytime soon.

items.title: Bitcoin Contributed Around $282 Million To Tesla’s Bottom Line In Q2, Saving It From An Even Uglier Stock Market Evisceration
items.summary: Bitcoin contributed around $282 million to Tesla's bottom line in Q2, saving it from a stock market decline. Tesla shares are down around 9 percent due to the steepest revenue decline in at least a decade.

items.title: The vanishing professions: 6 jobs that may not exist in the next decade
items.summary: As automation, AI, and digital convenience reshape the workforce, several once-essential jobs are quietly disappearing. From cashiers and telemarketers to travel agents and toll booth operators, roles built on routine tasks are being phased out.

items.summary: IAB Canada Mid-Year Recap reflecting on a year of remarkable momentum in the industry as it heads into a summer break.

items.summary: Google leaks entire Pixel 10 lineup, leaving little to the imagination.

items.summary: Ad agency holding companies have shared their earnings amid AI advancements and acquisitions, highlighting winners and losers. The paradox of 'transparent nontransparency' is discussed in the context of media strength.
